sentence.Network_en: Europeans prefer complexity and nuance, the Japanese revere minuteness and minimalism.
sentence.Network_cn: 欧洲人更喜欢复杂及细微差别, 日本人崇敬细微和极简派艺术.

sentence.Network_en: In the abyss of his mind he apprehends the world's minuteness.
sentence.Network_cn: 在他的心灵深处,他体会到世界的渺小.

sentence.Network_en: By and by we shall discuss these matters with minuteness.
sentence.Network_cn: 马上我们将花费大量时间讨论这些问题.
